full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### TBIPS - Grants and Contributions Transformation Initiative (GCTI) - Architecture Services

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Canada (DFATD) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of TBIPS (Task-Based Informatics Professional Services) architecture services in support of the Grants and Contributions Transformation Initiative (GCTI). The objective is to establish a pool of skilled resources with expertise in conceptualizing, implementing, improving, and deploying Microsoft Dynamics 365 Online and Power Platform capabilities in the cloud environment.

#### Key Details

* **Reference Number:** 24-252023
* **Solicitation Date:** November 17, 2023
* **Closing Date:** December 4, 2023
* **Anticipated Start Date:** January 2, 2024
* **Estimated Delivery Date:** January 1, 2025

#### Requirements

* The successful bidder must provide Application/Software Architects Level 3 with a Secret clearance to support the development of a partner-centric portal that will streamline and accelerate the Department's funding and reporting procedures.
* The resources must have experience in a cloud environment and be proficient in MS Dynamics 365 Online and Power Platform capabilities.
* The contract will be for a period of 12 months, with an option to extend for two additional periods of 12 months each.

#### Security Clearance

* Common PS SRCL #19 applies.
* Minimum Corporate Security Required: Secret
* Minimum Resource Security Required: Secret

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Betty Woodman
* **Contact Phone Number:** 343-203-6922
* **Contact Email:** [betty.woodman@international.gc.ca](mailto:betty.woodman@international.gc.ca)

#### Instructions to Suppliers

* Proposals must be submitted in electronic format.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier.
* Documents may be presented in either official language.
* Bidders are advised to contact the Contracting Authority for any inquiries regarding this RFP.  Note that "BuyAndSell.GC.CA" is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents. 

#### Note

*  TBIPS is refreshed three (3) times per year. If interested in becoming a Qualified SA Holder, please contact RCNMDAI.-NCRIMOS@pwgsc.gc.ca. 
* This contract is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), among other
